WorkItem.Description:
It will be good to add a parameter to override read-only file.

Currently I have to add extra line before each CTT call like this

 

attrib -r MY.config

%cttPath% s:My.config t:MY.CTT d:MY.config
WorkItem.Summary: Add ability to override read-only file

Comments.Message: sorry, tool is not supported anymore. I don't use it and I don't have a time to upgrade anything. but feel free to use sources to build your own version!
